metadata.title: CVE-2015-0203 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The qpidd broker in Apache Qpid 0.30 and earlier allows remoteauthenticated users to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via an AMQPmessage with (1) an invalid range in a sequence set, (2) content-bearingmethods other than message-transfer, or (3) a session-gap control before acorresponding session-attach.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
